actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to permit all compensation paid at regular rates to certain employees of the Alaska railroad to be included in the computation of their civil service retirement annuities.

summary.text: Permits all compensation paid at regular rates to specified employees of the Alaska Railroad to be included in the computation of their civil service retirement annuities. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331)

titles.title: A bill to permit all compensation paid at regular rates to certain employees of the Alaska railroad to be included in the computation of their civil service retirement annuities.
